{{ddcl|since=c++20|header=chrono|
const std::chrono::time_zone* locate_zone( std::string_view tz_name );
}}

Convenience function for locating a time zone in the time zone database. Equivalent to {{c|std::chrono::get_tzdb().locate_zone(tz_name)}}.

===Exceptions===
{{lc|std::runtime_error}} if the specified time zone cannot be found, or if this is the first reference to the time zone database and the time zone database cannot be initialized.

===Notes===
A call to this function that is the first reference to the time zone database will cause it to be initialized.
